event.title: Open Source Software for Climate Action
event.metaTitle: Open Source Software for Climate Action
event.metaDesc: Join us for Open Source Friday as we learn how the moja global community is saving the environment.
event.content: Join Rizel Scarlett (@blackgirlbytes) and Harsh Mishra to learn all about Moja Global, a community backed by the Linux Foundation that supports ambitious climate action by developing pioneering, open-source software!
